issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

Building the SDK from source fails when using an sdk greater than 13

Output from using NDK 13 https://www.dropbox.com/s/gaj7vrwrsb75kfj/output13.txt?dl=1

Output from using NDK 14 https://www.dropbox.com/s/23cyv5l6npwm51a/output14.txt?dl=1

h5.Steps to reproduce

# Download NDK 13 or greater https://github.com/android-ndk/ndk/wiki
# Run {{node scons.js build android --android-ndk <path> --android-sdk <path>}}

h5.Actual

Build fails with the errors listed in the txt files

h5.Expected

Build should pass or fail if the NDK is unsupported
fields.summary: Build: Building Android from source fails using NDK 13 or greater
fields.environment:
NDK 13 or 14
OSX 10.11.6
Node 6.9.5
titanium-mobile: master

comments.body: This was done in TIMOB-24297/the V8 upgrades. Closing as fixed
